items.title: Prepare financial statements
items.description: Create monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports including balance sheets and income statements.

items.title: Reconcile bank accounts
items.description: Match company records with bank statements to ensure accuracy and identify discrepancies.

items.title: Process accounts payable
items.description: Review, approve, and process vendor invoices and payments according to company policies.

items.title: Manage accounts receivable
items.description: Track customer payments, send invoices, and follow up on overdue accounts.

items.title: Conduct budget analysis
items.description: Compare actual financial performance against budgets and forecasts to identify variances.

items.title: Prepare tax returns
items.description: Calculate tax liabilities, prepare filings, and ensure compliance with tax regulations.

items.title: Maintain general ledger
items.description: Record and categorize all financial transactions in the company's accounting system.

items.title: Conduct internal audits
items.description: Review financial processes and controls to ensure accuracy and identify improvement opportunities.

items.title: Analyze cost structures
items.description: Examine operational expenses and identify opportunities for cost reduction and efficiency improvements.

items.title: Prepare month-end close
items.description: Complete monthly accounting procedures including journal entries and account reconciliations.

items.title: Manage fixed assets
items.description: Track company assets, calculate depreciation, and maintain asset registers.

items.title: Coordinate external audits
items.description: Work with external auditors to provide documentation and support audit processes.

items.title: Create financial forecasts
items.description: Develop projections and models to predict future financial performance and cash flow needs.

items.title: Ensure regulatory compliance
items.description: Monitor adherence to accounting standards, regulations, and reporting requirements.

items.title: Analyze profitability
items.description: Examine revenue streams and profit margins to identify most profitable business areas.

items.title: Manage cash flow
items.description: Monitor cash position, predict funding needs, and optimize working capital management.

items.title: Prepare board reports
items.description: Create executive-level financial summaries and presentations for board meetings.

items.title: Review financial contracts
items.description: Analyze contracts for financial implications, revenue recognition, and accounting treatment.

items.title: Implement accounting software
items.description: Configure and optimize financial systems to improve accuracy and efficiency.

items.title: Train accounting staff
items.description: Provide guidance and training to junior accountants on procedures and best practices.

items.title: Monitor financial risks
items.description: Identify and assess potential financial risks and recommend mitigation strategies.

items.title: Coordinate budget planning
items.description: Work with departments to develop annual budgets and financial planning processes.
